We had a big group and finding a place that can accommodate is not always easy.  They were great to work with at Somorrostro.  Our waitress did everything possible to make our experience the best - she translated to English for those that needed it, made great suggestions, really took care of us.  The food was fantastic, the drinks moderately priced, the atmosphere fun.  It's a tiny place on a small little back street in Barceloneta that's packed with people of all types.  The only downside was the table next to us who wanted a more quiet, intimate place - which this place is not.  They complained about everything and actually asked us to laugh more quietly.  I'm pretty sure they won't be back again, but we will!
